description.@en: Your hammer glows with a white light, purifying all those whom you ‘purify’ with it.

criticalFailure.@en: You invoke the names of the sacred gods above incorrectly, you fool! As punishment, your weapon is sundered, ruined forever.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but any victim struck with the weapon cannot Dodge or Parry it.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, your hammer beams with pure, white light. Instead of using your [CB], refer to your [WB] to determine Damage. Finally, ever you strike or Parry with this weapon, refer to your Odweft Skill instead of a Combat-based Skill. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, as if it were a melee weapon.
